name: hyperpowers
description: Structured development workflows for Gemini CLI - brings hyperpowers skills, agents, and issue tracking to Gemini CLI users
author: Dmitry Polishuk

skills.description: Exposes hyperpowers skills as Gemini CLI tools

bd.description: Integrates with bd (beads) issue tracking system

brainstorm.description: Start a brainstorming session to refine an idea into a design
brainstorm.prompt: Use the hyperpowers-brainstorming skill to help the user refine their idea. Ask clarifying questions one at a time, research existing patterns, and guide them through creating an epic with immutable requirements.

write-plan.description: Create a detailed implementation plan for a task
write-plan.prompt: Use the hyperpowers-writing-plans skill to expand the current task with detailed implementation steps. Add exact file paths, complete code examples, and verification commands.

execute-plan.description: Execute a plan iteratively with checkpoint reviews
execute-plan.prompt: Use the hyperpowers-executing-plans skill to work through the current epic's tasks. Execute one task, review learnings, create/refine next task, then stop at a checkpoint for user review.

review-implementation.prompt: Use the hyperpowers-review-implementation skill to verify the implementation matches the bd spec, all success criteria are met, and anti-patterns are avoided.

bd-path.description: Path to the bd (beads) CLI executable
